Title: Tweet Me!
Description: Tweet Me! makes it easier for tweeter users to send tweets very fast from their PC by clicking a hot-key, typing the tweet and press enter. With Tweet Me! You'll no longer have to use a complex application for just sending your daily or hourly tweets. It's developed in C# and WPF
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Tweet Me! makes it easier for tweeter users to send tweets very fast from their PC by clicking a hot-key, typing the tweet and press enter. With Tweet Me! You'll no longer have to use a complex application for just sending your daily or hourly tweets. It's developed in C# and WPF.

For example, by simply pressing on Ctrl+Q while you work with your machine, the following tweet-bar popup appears:


Now you have a chance to write what you'r doing or to post any message. Write it down and press 'Enter'. You're done!


This is it for the first iteration.
If you have any comments or wishes, please let me know.
